tool_description: API to get news feed and tweets for cryptocurrencies.
name: Coinfeeds
title: Coinfeeds

api_list.name: list
api_list.description: list of coins supported by the feeds api
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coinfeeds.p.rapidapi.com/coins/list/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coinfeeds.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://coinfeeds.p.rapidapi.com/coins/list/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coinfeeds.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: tweets
api_list.description: Get tweet-ids for tweets that mention a specific coin

api_list.name: feed
api_list.description: Gets news feed for a specific coin
